content: a super easy and fun crochet toy for babies and toddlers **yarn requirements** schachenmayr catania solids 100% cotton in 7-9 different colors approximately 20g per color **sizes** one-size **gauge** 26 sts x 36 rs = 10 cm x 10 cm = 4 in x 4 in **material** 3 0mm us 3 crochet hook darning needle fiberfill stuffing **techniques** magic_ring chain and single_crochet **final measurements** approximately 10cm x 12cm
